text: Barangkapeue hai nyang na bak gata Qur'an tabaca tapujoe Allah Got pih barangpeue buet takeureuja Allah TaÊ»ala Neukalon sudah Meu ka tapubuet bah barangkapeue Hana meusapeue lupot bak Allah Bah ube meumeut nyang na di bumoe Bandum Neuteupue hana meuilah Got pih di langet got pih ubit that Got pih raya that han ek tapeugah Bandum cit ka na di dalam kitab Kalheuh meusurat sideh Neukeubah
